title: PM condemns Chaman blast
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 10 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday strongly condemned the explosion in Chaman that killed at least five people and injured several others.
Prime Minister prayed for the departed souls to rest in peace and directed best medical care for the injured, PM office said.
The explosive was fitted in a motorcycle parked at Chamanâ€™s Mall Road, resulting in the blast that killed passersby.
